name: ts-httpexceptions
description: Provide exception for HTTP Rest API

scripts.coverage: npm run test-cov && npm run test-remap
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.test: npm run tsc && mocha --reporter spec --check-leaks --bail test/
scripts.test:cov: istanbul cover -x "examples/**" node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot --check-leaks test/ && npm run test:remap
scripts.test:travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks test/
scripts.build:doc: ./node_modules/typedoc/bin/typedoc --target ES6 --module commonjs --name TsHttpExceptions --exclude test --out docs/ src/**/
scripts.commit:doc: git status --porcelain | grep . || (git commit -m 'build documentation' && git push origin master)

author: Romakita
